text: @narendramodi @BillGates @gatesfoundation Collaboration is the need of the hour and India under your leadership is in safe hands! But to face the #COVID19 we need production of indigenous Rapid testing kits, PPES, research, AI driven technology and robots, Apps on a war footing... More Testings.
